long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maximize your browsing efficiency with the Bold Text Extractor Chrome extension. Designed to help users quickly gather key information, this tool scans the Google SERP and extracts all text that has been emphasized in bold.  

Features:

Instant Extraction: Click the extension icon, and immediately pull all bold text from the active webpage.
Easy Access: All extracted text is displayed in a simple, clean interface within the extension popup.
One-Click Copy: With a single click, copy all extracted bold text to your clipboard, making it easy to paste and use in documents, notes, or emails.
High Compatibility: Works on any webpage where bold text is used, including news sites, blogs, academic articles, and more.
